column5: anyone have any thoughts on english river fishing for walleyes (possibly in july) ON UMFREVILLE LAKE OR SEPERATION LAKE? rhanks

GREG I HAVE BEEN FISHING AT SEPARATION FOR THE PAST 10YEARS.I ALWAYS FISH THE FIRST WEEK OF JUNE.WALLEYES ARE GOOD IN BOTH LAKES.SEPARATION HAS BIGGER NORTHERN.THE SMALLMOUTH FISHING IS GOOD TO.GREAT LODGE NICE FAMILY OWNS THE PLACE.GOOD LUCK(SJW)
